Song.title: Every Tongue
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Mark Altrogge © 2002 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [| G | A/G | C | G | G | A/C# | C | G |]
Verse 1: Oh [G]gather ‘round the [A/C#]throne of grace And [C]sing His vict’ry [G]song Our [G]King rode forth to [A/C#]bloody war And [C]now He has come [D]home He [Bm]crushed the mighty d[C2]ragon He [Bm]broke his cruel re[C2]ign He [G]broke the shackles [A/C#]of our sins And [C]freed us [D]from our [G]chains [| G |]
Chorus: Let [G]every tongue and [Em]every tribe, sing [C]praises, [D/F#]praises Let [G]all creation{,} m[Em]agnify Your [Am7]glorious [D/F#]name For[Em]ever is not [D]long enough To [C]sing of all You’ve [A7/C#]done Be [C]praised by ev’ry [Eb]tribe{,} and ev’ry t[G | G |]ongue
Verse 2: Oh [G]look around and [A/C#]see the saints All [C]trophies of His [G]grace And [G]to the Victor [A/C#]go the spoils Our h[C]earts, our lives, our [D]praise Take [Bm]pleasure when You [C2]look on The [Bm]fruit of all Your [C2]pain En[G]joy Your glory [A/C#]formed in us You s[C]uffered n[D]ot in v[G]ain [| G | (to chorus)]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 oh gather round the throne of grace and sing his victry song our king rode forth to bloody war and now he has come home he crushed the mighty dragon he broke his cruel reign he broke the shackles of our sins and freed us from our chains chorus let every tongue and every tribe sing praises praises let all creation magnify your glorious name forever is not long enough to sing of all youve done be praised by evry tribe and evry tongue verse 2 oh look around and see the saints all trophies of his grace and to the victor go the spoils our hearts our lives our praise take pleasure when you look on the fruit of all your pain enjoy your glory formed in us you suffered not in vain
